channel.title: CVE Feed for Qualcomm, Inc. -- All Qualcomm products
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Qualcomm, Inc. -- All Qualcomm products

item.title: CVE-2016-5855|2024-08-06T01:15:10.744Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In a driver in all Qualcomm products with Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, or QRD Android, a user-supplied buffer is casted to a structure without checking if the source buffer is large enough.

item.title: CVE-2016-5854|2024-08-06T01:15:10.784Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In a driver in all Qualcomm products with Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, or QRD Android, kernel heap memory can be exposed to userspace.

item.title: CVE-2016-5858|2024-08-06T01:15:10.743Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In an ioctl handler in all Qualcomm products with Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, or QRD Android, if a user supplies a value too large, then an out-of-bounds read occurs.

item.title: CVE-2016-5871|2024-08-06T01:15:10.416Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, an integer overflow to buffer overflow vulnerability exists when loading an image file.

item.title: CVE-2016-5863|2024-08-06T01:15:10.795Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In an ioctl handler in all Qualcomm products with Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, or QRD Android, several sanity checks are missing which can lead to out-of-bounds accesses.

item.title: CVE-2016-5860|2024-08-06T01:15:10.801Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In an audio driver in all Qualcomm products with Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, or QRD Android, if a function is called with a very large length, an integer overflow could occur followed by a heap buffer overflow.

item.title: CVE-2016-5347|2024-08-06T01:00:59.637Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, kernel stack data can be leaked to userspace by an audio driver.

item.title: CVE-2016-5867|2024-08-06T01:15:10.826Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In a sound driver in Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, QRD Android, some variables are from userspace and values can be chosen that could result in stack overflow.

item.title: CVE-2016-5864|2024-08-06T01:15:09.045Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In an audio driver function in all Qualcomm products with Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, or QRD Android, some parameters are from userspace, and if they are set to a large value, integer overflow is possible followed by buffer overflow. In another function, a missing check for a lower bound may result in an out of bounds memory access.

item.title: CVE-2016-5862|2024-08-06T01:15:10.737Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: When a control related to codec is issued from userspace in all Qualcomm products with Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, or QRD Android, the type casting is done to the container structure instead of the codec's individual structure, resulting in a device restart after kernel crash occurs.

item.title: CVE-2016-5853|2024-08-06T01:15:10.231Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In an audio driver in all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, when a sanity check encounters a length value not in the correct range, an error message is printed, but code execution continues in the same way as for a correct length value.

item.title: CVE-2016-5861|2024-08-06T01:15:09.041Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In a display driver in all Qualcomm products with Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, or QRD Android, a variable controlled by userspace is used to calculate offsets and sizes for copy operations, which could result in heap overflow.

item.title: CVE-2016-5859|2024-08-06T01:15:10.642Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In a sound driver in all Qualcomm products with Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, or QRD Android, if a function is called with a very large length, an integer overflow could occur followed by a buffer overflow.

item.title: CVE-2016-5872|2024-08-06T01:15:10.802Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, arguments to several QTEE syscalls are not properly validated.
